EmailTemplate.subject: Want a Trade-In Credit? – LASEREF IV Upgrade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Now is the time to upgrade to business aviation’s best inertial reference system – Honeywell’s LASEREF IV – the perfect replacement for your older LASEREF II or LASEREF III system. For a limited time, Honeywell and Western Jet Aviation are offering attractive promotional pricing and a $52,500 Honeywell trade-in credit for operators who install the LASEREF IV by Dec. 31, 2020. Some benefits of this upgrade include:
- 30% improvement in reliability - 35% weight reduction - Considerably reduced power consumption - Lowest cost of ownership of any IRS flying today
Take advantage now of this incredible savings opportunity!
